title: Summary and recording available: California and Southwest drought and wildfire webinar
content:
Drought hammered the southwestern United States in spring 2021. Credit: U.S. Drought Monitor
On May 24, 2021, the National Integrated Drought Information System (NIDIS) hosted a Drought Update and Wildfire Outlook Webinar for California and the Southwest. The webinar summary and recording are now available.
The webinar provided stakeholders and other interested parties in the region with timely information on the current drought status and outlook, as well as the wildland fire potential outlook.
